TextLibrary.Text: We need to get into Bane's Citadel.
We need to get into Bane's Citadel.
We need to get into Bane's Citadel.
We need to get into Bane's Citadel.

Oh, aye, lad. I can get ye in there, though the doors be thicker than an Ogre's head. You know, I once managed to crack the lock that led to King Oleg's privvy, and let me tell you that the walls on his privvy were at least twice as thick as this bein' that Oleg had a bit of taste for cabbage stew and red...
